parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Roads and Airports

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Find the road segments within the circle of given radius.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> pos '''nearRoads''' radius

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> pos: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]], center of search radius

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> radius: [[Number]] - search radius in meters

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]]s - road segments within radius

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_list = [[player]] [[nearRoads]] 50;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_list = ([[position]] _unit) [[nearRoads]] 50;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_list = [1800,5700] [[nearRoads]] 50;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isOnRoad]], [[roadAt]], [[surfaceIsWater]], [[roadsConnectedTo]], [[findNearestEnemy]], [[nearestBuilding]], [[nearestObject]], [[nearestObjects]], [[nearObjects]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearEntities]], [[nearTargets]], [[nearSupplies]], [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]], [[nearObjectsReady]], [[getRoadInfo]], [[nearestTerrainObjects]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 26 Mar, 2011</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster ]]<dd class="note">
NearRoads always gets data in the same order. In a 300 meter radius around Feruz Abad, for example, the first one is in the south-west corner and the last one is in the north-east.
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
